title: {websiteName} Privacy Policy
subtitle: Our commitment to protecting your data while advancing open-access research

sections.title: Data Collection
sections.content: {websiteName} collects only the data necessary to provide our open-source, browser-based database services, such as user account details (e.g., email, name) and research data submitted voluntarily. All data is collected in compliance with FAIR principles, ensuring transparency and accessibility.

sections.title: Data Usage
sections.content: We use your data to enable platform functionality, including data management, CIDOC-CRM mapping, and collaborative research. {websiteName} does not use personal data for marketing or share it with third parties without explicit consent, except as required by law.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: {websiteName} employs encryption and blockchain-based provenance tracking to secure your data. Our open-source platform is regularly audited by the community to ensure robust protection of archaeological, historical, and prosopographical data.

sections.title: Data Sharing and FAIR Principles
sections.content: As an open-access platform, {websiteName} shares anonymized research data under open licenses, adhering to FAIR principles (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, Reusable). Personal data is never shared without consent, and users control their data's visibility.

sections.title: User Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data on {websiteName}. Contact our support team to exercise these rights or review our policies for managing your contributions to our CIDOC-CRM-compliant database.
